verses.name: Matthew 9:28
verses.text: And when he was come into the house, the blind men came to him: and Jesus saith unto them, Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord.

verses.name: Matthew 9:29
verses.text: Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.

verses.name: Matthew 9:30
verses.text: And their eyes were opened; and Jesus straitly charged them, saying, See that no man know it.

verses.name: Matthew 9:31
verses.text: But they, when they were departed, spread abroad his fame in all that country.

verses.name: Matthew 9:32
verses.text: As they went out, behold, they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil.
